altername_name: The Scorpion King: Aufstieg des Akkadiers
name: The Scorpion King: Rise of the Akkadian
overview: The Scorpion King: Rise of the Akkadian is an action-adventure game released in 2002 for the Nintendo GameCube and the PlayStation 2. The game was developed by Point of View, Inc. and was published by VU Games in North American and Universal Interactive in the PAL region. It is based on the film The Scorpion King.
